00019 #ifndef _WATER_H
00020 #define _WATER_H
00021 
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <exception>
00024 #include "xmlnode.h"
00025 #include "observable.h"
00026 
00027 class Water;
00028 class WaterException;
00029 
00030 class Water : public Observable
00031 {
00032 public:
00033    Water();
00034    Water(XmlNode *node);
00035 
00036    friend bool operator<(Water &w1, Water &w2);
00037 
00038    std::string toXml();
00039    
00040    void setName( const std::string &var );
00041    void setAmount_l( double var );
00042    void setCalcium_ppm( double var );
00043    void setSulfate_ppm( double var );
00044    void setBicarbonate_ppm( double var );
00045    void setChloride_ppm( double var );
00046    void setSodium_ppm( double var );
00047    void setMagnesium_ppm( double var );
00048    void setPh( double var );
00049    void setNotes( const std::string &var );
00050    
00051    std::string getName() const;
00052    double getAmount_l() const;
00053    double getCalcium_ppm() const;
00054    double getBicarbonate_ppm() const;
00055    double getSulfate_ppm() const;
00056    double getChloride_ppm() const;
00057    double getSodium_ppm() const;
00058    double getMagnesium_ppm() const;
00059    double getPh() const;
00060    std::string getNotes() const;
00061    
00062 private:
00063    std::string name;
00064    static const int version = 1;
00065    double amount_l;
00066    double calcium_ppm;
00067    double bicarbonate_ppm;
00068    double sulfate_ppm;
00069    double chloride_ppm;
00070    double sodium_ppm;
00071    double magnesium_ppm;
00072    double ph;
00073    std::string notes;
00074 
00075    void setDefaults();
00076 };
00077 
00078 class WaterException : public std::exception
00079 {
00080 public:
00081    
00082    virtual const char* what() const throw()
00083    {
00084       // Note: this temporary object might get destroyed too early.
00085       // I'm not really sure.
00086       return std::string("BeerXml WATER error: " + _err + "\n").c_str();
00087    }
00088    
00089    WaterException( std::string message )
00090    {
00091       _err = message;
00092    }
00093    
00094    ~WaterException() throw() {}
00095    
00096 private:
00097    
00098    std::string _err;
00099 };
00100 
00101 struct Water_ptr_cmp
00102 {
00103    bool operator()( Water* lhs, Water* rhs)
00104    {
00105       return *lhs < *rhs;
00106    }
00107 };
